name: TVTopShelfProvider
desc: The interface for providing items to display in the main menu’s Top Shelf user interface on an Apple TV.

items.name: var topShelfItems: [TVContentItem]
items.desc: Returns an array of content items to be displayed.

items.name: var topShelfStyle: TVTopShelfContentStyle
items.desc: The user interface style that should be used to display the content items.

items.name: enum TVTopShelfContentStyle
items.desc: An enumerated type used to specify the style in which you want your content to be displayed.

items.name: static let TVTopShelfItemsDidChange: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification to post when your app’s Top Shelf content has changed.
